post.body: Yes he will be very sad! Don't hate me cuz I'm cold.
Haha. I don't have any new followers tho! Rats. You can't tell but there is the classic juxtaposition of cleavage/Santa there.
Monkey test? Eek eek!
People playing trivia in ICT are much smarter than the ones in HUT.
If I do 18 more art portraits for peeps, I will have enough for that RX8...i'm just sayin.
Dave texted last night if we were all getting together for coffee. I said nope, it's too cold. KimBlee will not leave the house today.
Happy Winter Soltice people! It's only going to get better from here! Well- until June 20 or 21. Then it starts downhill again...
Must finish that last picture for Amy today, she wants them by Tues and I want my 750.00!!
Listening to Little Big Town, sucking back coffee and ibuprofen-It's this MT's modus operandi!
The shiraz last night gave me a headache!!! booo hooo
Work, nail appt, then ICT for trivia at Buffalo W.W., shopping if time, then luminaria party. Deck the halls with boughs of horry, fa ra ra
I just heard there are only a few days til Christmas. Egad.
ohhhh, duh. I can see the cleavage now. I need my eyes checked! I cropped mine out, keeping it clean, people, keepin it clean
YES... why? What became of the cleavage picture? Intrigued...
ARe they doing that so they don't feel responsible for losing half your money to corporate greed and the democrats?
That's Santa, duh! :) That was last year at some toys for tots party.
Is that okay, Jacque if I have my Christmas bash AFTER christmas?
It's been a semi-crappy year. Here's to 09
My holiday party will be after the holidays. Thinking Island theme in January. Rum punch, coconut shrimp/mango salsa, etc. yeah, baybayy!
Can anyone tell me why Nancy Grace started this whole "tot mom" thing. I don't get it. Only thing more annoying than NG herself is tot mom.
